RESOLVED_ENTITIES.the airplane: the airplane to New York City
RESOLVED_ENTITIES.the motel room: the motel room in San Antonio

AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Juventino Mejia-Orosco's van: Vehicle used by Juventino Mejia-Orosco to transport individuals across the border from Guatemala and within the United States, seized pending forfeiture proceedings
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.the motel room in San Antonio: Location where Juventino Mejia-Orosco, Hector Galvencio Paz-Ortega, and Carlos Enrique Cruz-Morales stayed during their time in San Antonio
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Juventino Mejia-Orosco's truck: Vehicle used by Juventino Mejia-Orosco for transporting curios from Guatemala to the United States
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.the airplane to New York City: Airplane on which Carlos Enrique Cruz-Morales was detained while awaiting departure
